name: Commonwealth v. Indemnity Insurance Company of North America, Appellant
name_abbreviation: Commonwealth v. Indemnity Insurance Co. of North America

parties: Commonwealth v. Indemnity Insurance Company of North America, Appellant.

opinions.text:
Opinion by
Mr. Justice Linn,
In accordance with the stipulation and agreement of counsel that a similar judgment may be entered in the appeal of this case as is ordered in the case of Commonwealth of Pennsylvania v. Globe Indemnity Company, the judgment is affirmed.
opinions.author: Mr. Justice Linn,

casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Indemnity Insurance Company of North America, Appellant.
June 26, 1936:
